channel.title: A basic tut?
channel.description:
well, hello everyone and yes, i have searched but i need some help.
I want to make a private server, but not online just offline untill i do it up ect and i wanted to know how can i do this? and also how to i set the java thing, because i run vista , i read the stickys and it wont work. I also wanna learn how to place things, rotate them, set commands ect just basic stuff. any help is appreciated.

item.title: A basic tut?
item.dc:creator: @MasterofPK MasterofPK
item.description:
@MasterofPK wrote:

Uhm… a server will work on a computer, no matter what operating system you use.

Read full topic
